data.name: OpsCheatEditor1_Codes_Comp6

data.name: ToolsConvertVcdNames_Explain
data.value:
This tool allows you to convert old format VCD filenames and it's associated ELF,ART,CFG,VMC files. Example: OLD: Grand Theft Auto 2.VCD NEW: SLES_014.04.Grand Theft Auto 2.VCD
Mode - Select the mode you are currently using. This will affect the prefix (XX. / SB.) Test Run - This allows you to see what it will be renamed without actually doing it. Delete ELFs - If checked it will delete the ELF files associated with the VCD. Copy LOG - Allows you to copy the Log Start - Starts the process
Please note that with the new OPL from PS2-Home you no longer need ELF files for each game.

data.name: OpsCheatEditor1_Codes_Cache1
data.value: Makes POPS buffer 1 sector instead of 16.

data.name: OpsCheatEditor1_Codes_Safemode
data.value: Disables the cheat engine and only activate it after POPS has left the PS OSD.

data.name: ToolsCleanFiles_Explanation
data.value: This tool can be used to clean files for games that you no longer have. It can perform three different actions: - "Dry run" to list the files without doing anything - "Move files to other folder" will move the files to a directory of your choosing, it's safer than the delete option - "Delete files" to DELETE the files PERMANENTLY
